title: Remade when I came back
body: Hi. my power went out during the loading time of a ranked game. I was queued with 2 others and was connecting back. I got into the game and the other two started a remake vote. I was already in the game and i said no because i was there as well as the other two members but the game was remade. Not sure why 2>3 gets counted.

replies.body:
When the /Remake goes to vote during a 4v5, it takes 30% of the team to pass the vote, so in this case, *two players*. Check out our [/Remake FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) for complete details on the system.

Let me know if you have any questions.
